title: OMECKY Connector with Watch Buckle Compatible with Apple Watch Band Adapter, Replacement Link Attachment for iWatch Ultra (49mm) Series 8 7 (41 45mm) SE Series 6 5 4 (44 40mm) Series 3 2 1 (42 38mm)
features: OMECKY watch band accessories for Apple Watch Ultra (49mm) Series 8 7(41mm 45mm) Series 6 5 4 SE (40mm 44mm) Series 3 2 1 (38mm 42mm).
Full range of sizes and various colors for your choice. Can switch your iwatch strap style, perfectly fit any size watch band.
OMECKY adapters are made of 316L stainless steel material and manufactured by CNC technology, durable and good performance.
Comes with a mini screwdriver for assembling the adapter, and with easy operation, you can simply replace your favorite watch band.
NOTE: 38mm/40mm41mm, 42mm/44mm/45mm/49mm refer to models of the Apple Watch, and the clasp fits for 20mm bands width, please check your watch before you purchase it.
description: Product Name: Watch Band Adapter Brand Name: OMECKY Material: 316L Stainless Steel Color: Black / Silver / Rose Gold

38mm/40mm/41mm: for Apple Watch Series 8 7 (41mm) Series 6 5 4 SE (40mm) Series 3 2 1 (38mm) 42mm/44mm/45mm/49mm: for Apple Watch Ultra (49mm) Series 8 7 (45mm) Series 6 5 4 SE (44mm) Series 3 2 1 (42mm)

1. Penetrate metal axials in to strap holes, align headers with metal axials, align screws with metal axials holes and keed tightened. 2. Simply slide it into place until you hear the ”click”, the side with a silver button must be faces the wrist. 3. To remove, press the release button on watch coupling and slide the band out.
3 Pairs of Watch Connector (Apple Watch is not included) 3 Pairs of 20mm Watch Straps Buckle 1 x Screwdriver
